About kisan gateway

Founders of the Kisan Gateway with a passion for Agricultural Services have come a long way since decades doing intense research in the industry before providing an innovative platform to farmer's community to put an end to problems that farmers faced in daily life. Perspective of religious trends and transformation with technology in rural areas and hence we are here to help resolve those flaws and achieve fastest results with little effort. write up about inspiration for founders to get into this business.

We're dedicated to giving the very best and sophisticated platform for farmers with a focus on dependability, customer service and uniqueness to provide wide range of services to sell/purchase aggro products like crops, machineries, livestocks, properties, biomass, silages, pumps and motors, seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, etc. We now serve customers all over India and farmers can pre-schedule their harvesting activities and we source the right vendors at the right time with the right price. We also provide transportation solutions with easy access and at affordable prices. We focus on a distinctive platform providing solutions to promote farmer's ads/offers to reach a wide range of farmers community on the portal. We hope you enjoy our services as much as we enjoy offering them to you.

Our Vission

Our vision is to Incubate, create, lead and implement socially desirable and financially sustainable outcomes in urban mobility.

Our Mission

Our vision is to Incubate, create, lead and implement socially desirable and financially sustainable outcomes in urban mobility.

Our Managment

Our average client retention has been over 8+ years owing to our deep understanding of our clients space and consistent value creation
